metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32052 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In Django 2.2 before 2.2.22, 3.1 before 3.1.10, and 3.2 before 3.2.2 (withPython 3.9.5+), URLValidator does not prohibit newlines and tabs (unlessthe URLField form field is used). If an application uses values withnewlines in an HTTP response, header injection can occur. Django itself isunaffected because HttpResponse prohibits newlines in HTTP headers.

criterions.comment: python-django: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
